Trigger A creature you can see damages you with a melee Strike.

You give your attacker a look of utter disappointment so heartbreaking that it causes them to feel shame for their actions. The attacker must succeed at a @Check[will|against:class-spell] saving throw against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher, or become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1} from the guilt. On a critical failure, they fail to follow through on the attack, reducing the triggering damage dealt to you by their Strength modifier.
